body.name: Ergonomic Office Chair, Adjustable Headrest, Breathable Mesh, Lumbar Support, Swivel Task Chair, Khaki
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 8 hrs 9 mins
features: 💫【Ergonomic Design--Improve Your Posture】Younmall high-back ergonomic office chair provides 5 support points (head/shoulder/back/hips/hands) and proper lumbar support, allowing you to maintain the correct sitting posture for a more comfortable experience, releasing stress and relieving shoulder and neck pain from long hours of work.

💫【High-Density Breathable Mesh & Cushion】The backrest and headrest are made of flexible, high-quality, non-patterned, breathable polyester mesh that allows air to flow freely to keep you cool and comfortable at all times. The aerospace material's high-density shaped cotton-filled seat cushion resists deformation and provides foam-like comfort to balance softness, durability and support to reduce pressure on your hips and tailbone.

💫【Safe & Reliable】The four-stage steel gas springs and heavy-duty nylon legs with a maximum load capacity of 350LB, silent chair wheels wrapped by PU can smoothly rotate 360°, basically meeting all the needs of customers for computer chairs. All of our Younmall ergonomic chairs are BIFMA and SGS certified, so customers can buy with confidence. The thickened explosion-proof steel chassis is durable, and all the details make this office chair more comfortable to sit on.

💫【Tilt and Lock Function & Adjustable Headrest】This office chair can tilt 90 ° ~ 135 °, when the handle is pulled out, you can achieve the office chair tilt function, so that you can get a short period of relaxation after work; when the handle is moved inward, the ergonomic office chair can be locked in an upright position. At the same time, the headrest can also be adjusted up and down as well as the angle adjustment, providing portability for different customers' needs on sitting posture.

💫【Easy Assembly & After-Sales Service】 All Younmall computer office chairs come with a 2-year warranty and replacement service. Installation is in 7 steps, all parts are in the package, our home office desk chairs can be installed in 15 minutes. Younmall office chairs are the best gift for yourself and your friends, the perfect office chair, study desk chair.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Overload Loading Capacity Made of high quality carbon steel material, with high density memory foam, it can reach 350 LBS of load-bearing capacity. Class 3 Hydraulic Mechanism Equipped with industrial quality Class 3 gas lift cylinders. Upgraded Gas Lift is SGS and BIFMA certified, reinforced framework, sturdier and safer. Rolls Quietly & Smoothly The casters are made of pu super silent material, which is zero damage to the wooden floor. And it can roll quietly and smoothly to facilitate your work. Tilt Tension Control Younmall ergonomic office desk chair explosion - proof tray with the handle wheel you can adjustable the sitting feeling of desk chair, gives you comforable and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for 300 lbs - way better than a normal gaming chair.
reviews.reviewText: First off, I have had this chair for a couple of months and realized you have to pull the handle OUT while not sitting on it to get it to recline. This is my fault for not reading the directions as I should have. Now that I have that figured out and the tension adjusted it works wonderfully.As stated I am a touch over 300lb and 6-2 and the chair very comfortable. I can sit comfortably for a normal workday with no fatigue or strain. The ergonomics help a lot in this category.The instructions were great and it is nice to get some tools but as like many things that we have to put together I used my own tools.Only option that could have made this chair better is having the arm rest move up and down vertically. Being able to lift up the arm rest is functional enough for what I need.Great chair overall; price, easy to put together, comfortable, stable, I like the black on white color scheme (looks like vertebrae from the back).Only Con (i could probably resolve this) the headrest is easily movable. For most that could be ok but I have to readjust it if lounging back.Will buy another one to replace my child's gaming chair since those only last less than a year for the same price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I just upgraded my old chair with this one with head rest, it’s been a game-changer for my sitting comfort. This chair combines style, functionality, and comfort in a way that is truly impressive.First and foremost, the adjustable headrest is a fantastic feature. It provides excellent support for your neck and allows you to customize it to your preferred height and angle. Whether you’re working long hours or simply relaxing, having a headrest that can be adjusted to your liking is a real luxury.The back support of this chair is well designed . It offers a great level of lumbar support, which is crucial for maintaining proper posture and preventing backaches. The adjustable backrest tilt feature adds even more versatility, allowing you to recline and find the perfect position for your comfort. Also it has adjustable arm which beneficial if you spend a lot of time typingNot only is this chair incredibly functional, but it also boasts a sleek and modern design. The black and white theme adds a touch of sophistication to any workspace or office environment. The materials used are of high quality, and the chair feels sturdy and well-built, giving you confidence in its durability.Overall, the eargonomic chair with adjustable headrest and back support is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to improve their sitting experience. It offers excellent customization options, providing optimal support for your head, back, and arms. Plus, its stylish design adds a touch of elegance to any space. Whether you’re working, gaming, or simply relaxing, this chair will undoubtedly enhance your comfort and overall well-being.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within a week
reviews.reviewText: What a waste, it looks nice and felt great but it broke within a week of buying it. Now I'm probably screwed cause I don't have the box anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, but swivels to the right when you're off the ground
reviews.reviewText: Chair was easy to assemble. Comfortable to sit on. My previous chair was a $200 one from a different brand on Amazon - it was too high up, the chair was not comfortable, and WAY harder to assemble. I have to say, this chair was MUCH easier to assemble, and to top it all off it looked better. I love this chair so far.BUT, I unfortunately do have a problem with this chair. When my feet are off the ground and I'm leaning back on the chair, it starts to turn to the right. I'm not sure why. I don't know how to fix it. Please let me know how to fix this.Otherwise, great chair, great price, and the color scheme is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good home office chair for long working hours - strong and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair after using one chair that I bought from eBay. The old chair was leather based and it was very bad quality. I was bit skeptical when I ordered this chair but to my surprise it has been one of the best buys for me. The chair is easy to assemble and sturdy as well as it gives very good comfort to the back. The lower back support is good and you can sit for long hours on this. The loth based material is also comfortable and is of good quality. Arms get folded up/down so it's east to tuck the chair in the table when not needed. I was able to assemble it in 30 mins. Overall this chair is worth a buy and will surely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: La silla es perfecta, por lo menos a mi me ayuda a relajar la lumbar y encima es estéticamente bonita.Montar la silla fue súper fácil e intuitivo, pero si necesitas ayuda igualmente viene con instrucciones y las herramientas necesarias para armarla.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful chair but the box came damaged and there is a tear in the headrest fabric
reviews.reviewText: The chair provides great support and feels comfortable, my only issue is the headrest has a tear in it, which could be a result of the damaged shipping box. That's why I gave it 3 stars instead of 4 or 5!Update: After about a month of use, the chair is still great minus the initial shipping damage, but the lumbar support is not adjustable and can be uncomfortable depending on your sitting position. I have instead unscrewed the support and moved it up to make it more comfortable, but it was definitely a hassle to try and remove it from its original position. If you find the support hits you in a weird spot, I would definitely recommend trying what I did!
